Summary: AuSom Enterprise Ltd has informed BSE that the Board of Directors of the Company at its meeting held on November 10, 2020, inter alia, has declared an Interim dividend of Rs. 0.50/- (Fifty Paisa only) per equity share of face value of Rs. 10/- each for the Financial Year 2020-21.

Declaration of 1st Interim Dividend:- <BR> The Board of Directors of the Company, in the aforesaid meeting have also approved/declared 1st Interim Dividend of Rs.3/- per equity share (i.e. 30% on the paid up equity share capital), for the Financial Year 2020-21 and has fixed Saturday, November 21, 2020 as the Record Date for the 1st Interim Dividend 2020-2021. <BR> <BR> Further please take note that dividend be paid to those shareholders holding shares in electronic form as per the beneficial ownership data made available by the National Securities Depository Limited (NSDL) and the Central Depository Services (India) Limited (CDSL) as at the end of working hours on November 21, 2020 and shares in physical form whose names shall appear on the Register of Members as on November 21, 2020.<BR> <BR> Payment of 1st Interim Dividend shall start from Wednesday, November 25, 2020.<BR>

The Board of Directors at its meeting held on 10th November, 2020 has approved Interim Dividend of 200% @Rs.4/- per equity share on the equity share capital of the Company for the financial year 2020-21.<BR>

The Board of Directors has declared the Interim Dividend of Re. 1 (10%) per equity share for the financial year 2020-2021. <BR> The Interim Dividend shall be paid to the Equity Shareholders of the Company, whose names appear on the Register of Members of the Company or in the records of the Depositories as beneficial owners of the shares as on Friday, November 20, 2020 which is the Record Date fixed for the purpose. <BR>
The Board of Directors at its meeting held today i.e., November 09, 2020 have declared an Interim Dividend of Rs.6/- per equity share (60%) for the Financial Year 2020-21.

Board of Directors have declared payment of Second Interim Dividend for the Financial Year 2020-21 @ Rs. 15/- per share (of the face value of Rs.10/- each), subject to TDS/Withholding Tax. ''Record Date'' for the purpose of payment of Second Interim Dividend for the Financial Year 2020-21 has been fixed as November 20, 2020 and is proposed to be paid within the time prescribed under law.

With reference to earlier letter dated November 02, 2020, GOCL Corporation Ltd has now informed BSE that the Board of Directors of the Company at its Meeting scheduled on November 12, 2020 will also consider Interim Dividend for the financial year 2020-21.

Sub: Regulation 30, 42, 43 and other applicable provisions of SEBI (Listing Obligations And Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015<BR> Pursuant to Regulation 30, 42, 43 and other applicable provisions of SEBI (Listing Obligations And Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015;<BR> 1. Insecticides (India) Ltd has informed BSE that the Board of Directors of the Company at its meeting held on November 09, 2020, inter alia, has declared an Interim Dividend of Rs. 2.00 per equity shares of face value of Rs. 10/- each for financial year ended March 31, 2021.

Insecticides (India) Ltd has informed BSE that the Board of Directors of the Company at its meeting held on November 09, 2020, inter alia, has declared an Interim Dividend of Rs. 2.00 per equity shares of face value of Rs. 10/- each for financial year ended March 31, 2021.

Pursuant to Regulation 30 of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015 (Listing Regulations), we hereby wish to inform you that the Board of Directors of the Company at their meeting held today 08th November, 2020, inter-alia: <BR> 2. declared an interim dividend @ 25% i.e. Rs. 0.5 per equity share of face value of Re. 2/- each for the financial year ending 31st March, 2021.The record date for the purpose of determining the entitlement of the shareholders for the interim dividend has been fixed as Thursday, 19th November, 2020, and dividend will be paid to the shareholders on or before 5th December, 2020.<BR> The Board of Directors'' meeting commenced at 12:30 p.m and concluded at 2:10 p.m. <BR>

With referfence to the earlier letter dated November 03, 2020 regarding the date of Board Meeting & business to be transacted thereat, AuSom Enterprise Ltd has now informed BSE that the Board of Directors shall also consider and if thought fit approve the declaration of Interim Dividend for F.Y. 2020-21, if any and other incidental aspects; in addition to the business items intimated vide letter dated November 03, 2020.

With reference to the earlier letter dated October 29, 2020, Aarti Industries Ltd has now informed BSE that the Board of Directors may consider and declare the Interim Dividend for the financial year 2020-2021 in its meeting scheduled to be held on November 10, 2020.

NACL Industries Ltd has informed BSE that the Board of Directors of the Company at its meeting held on November 04, 2020, inter alia, has declared an interim dividend @ of 10% (i.e. Re.0.10/-) per equity share of Rs. 1/- each of the Company for the financial year ending March 31, 2021.

ASM Technologies Ltd has informed BSE that the Board of Directors of the Company at its meeting held on November 04, 2020, inter alia, has declared an Interim dividend of Rs. 2.00/- per equity share of Rs. 10/- each, for the year 2020-2021. Dividend will be paid on or before December 03, 2020.

In continuation to our letter dated 26th October, 2020, with regard to the ensuing Board Meeting to be held on Wednesday, 04th November, 2020 to consider the Un-audited Financial Results for the second quarter and half year ended 30th September, 2020, we wish to inform that the Board will also consider the proposal for declaration of first interim dividend for the financial year 2020-21.<BR> Record date:<BR> Pursuant to Regulation 42 of SEBI Listing Regulations 2015, the Interim Dividend, if declared, shall be paid to equity shareholders of the Company whose names appear on the Register of Members of the Company or in the records of Depositories as beneficial owners of the shares as on Friday, the 13th November, 2020, which is the Record Date fixed for the purpose.

Balkrishna Industries Ltd has informed BSE that a meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company is scheduled to be held on November 06, 2020 inter alia, to consider and approve Standalone and Consolidated Unaudited financial results of the Company for the quarter and half year ended September 30, 2020 and to consider declaration of 2nd Interim Dividend on equity shares for the financial year 2020-21, if any.<BR><BR>The Company has intimated earlier that the Trading Window Close Period commenced from October 01, 2020 till 48 hours after the Unaudited financial results of the Company for the quarter and half year ended September 30, 2020 becomes generally available information.
